org.controlsfx.validation.decoration

Class CompoundValidationDecoration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.controlsfx.validation.decoration.AbstractValidationDecoration
      • org.controlsfx.validation.decoration.CompoundValidationDecoration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidationDecoration

    public class CompoundValidationDecoration
extends AbstractValidationDecoration
    Validation decoration to combine several existing decorations into one. Here is example of combining GraphicValidationDecoration and StyleClassValidationDecoration
